name: Cross Country Rallye
overview: Cross Country Rallye is a 1 - 8 player racing game for the Apple II. The player controls a small automobile through a series of winding roads in the countryside, attempting to reach series of 8 checkpoints in order. The player must watch their fuel supplies while racing, while finding their way through maze-like country roads. The player receives a score based upon the time it takes to reach all checkpoints, and return to the initial starting point.
